short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Extension for tracking current times across multiple time zones. Ideal for planning meetings or simply checking the time anywhere.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Whether you're scheduling meetings, planning projects, or simply trying to stay in sync with team members around the world, Team TimeZone makes it easy.

With an intuitive interface and robust feature set, Team TimeZone allows you to:

🌐 Track Multiple Time Zones: View current times across different time zones in a single glance.

🔥Customizable Time Zone Labels: Exclusively with Team TimeZone, you can assign custom labels to time zones. 

🔥Add individual team member names, such as "Kathy, Tom, and Jerry," to any time zone, so you know exactly who you’re coordinating with at a glance. No other extension offers this level of personalization!

📅 Date and Time Adjustments: Plan for the future by adjusting dates and times across multiple zones with a simple slider. See exactly what time it will be for everyone involved, no matter when the meeting or deadline is scheduled.

🛠️ Simple, User-Friendly Interface: A clean and modern UI that makes it easy to add, edit, and delete time zones and labels in just a few clicks.

🚀 Perfect for Remote Teams: Whether you're a project manager, freelancer, or part of a global team, Team TimeZone helps you manage time zone differences effortlessly. Great for scheduling across countries or just across time zones in a large country.

🔍 Search and Add Zones Easily: Use the search function to quickly add new time zones, ensuring your global coverage is complete.

Why Install Team TimeZone?

Unlike other time zone tools, Team TimeZone allows you to customize your tracking by adding specific team member names to each time zone. This feature helps eliminate confusion and saves time, especially when working with larger teams spread across different regions. Simply add their names once, and always have their local time at your fingertips.

Install Team TimeZone today and transform the way you manage time across your team, making it easier than ever to collaborate across borders and time zones!
